Reviews.Title: “worst hotel ever!!!”

Reviews.Content: wife chose honeymoon hotel terrible idea unlike star hotel stayed inthe carpet stained bathroom dirty disgusting smell noise surrounding guests unsettling staff unapproachable unhelpful write reviews websites compelled hope honeymooning couples avoid repeating mistake honeymoon low left airport avoid spending building expected hotel location especially following recommendation travel agent friend recommend

Reviews.Content: frequent customer hotel didnt visited left days ago personnel efficient service clean fancy hotel option downtown comforable clean

Reviews.Author: JoannaVou
Reviews.Content: hotel perfectly located close centre noisy touristic atmosphere clean comfortable helpful staff avoid lower floors stayed floor hear metro time didnt mind

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4 star Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mlodyosiem
Reviews.Content: positives reception looks nice marble floor couches corner entrance diner elevators food breakfast nice choice meat cheese drinks fresh juices bread beef stew afternoon advise eat food hotel cause food city usually rubbish barca tv barcelona match barca tv cool unfortunately spanish catalan couldnt understand air conditioning boiling hot barcelona heat negatives elevators doesnt slow arrive stairs time 3rd floor booked 301 302 4 star hotel couldnt believe bathroom 4 star hotel standard window mate window bathroom obscene double beds werent actually double beds single beds wheels bed missing moved bed bed moved tv single channel english language staff bartenders waiters english supposed communicate staff guess spent 5 days barcelona didnt meet friendly people price paid 110 euros night worth money location start rambla de catalunya diagonal nice street palms bad

Reviews.Title: “Business-oriented hotel, big rooms, very clean, FREE wi-fi”
Reviews.Author: blazerbryant
Reviews.Content: balmoral hotel hotel stayed 2 week holiday mediterranean coast located near diagonal metro stop easy 10 minute ride downtown little nondescript outside nice little sterile looking lobby eat restaurantbar looked nice mirrored elevators american standards european 7th floor largest europe standard unit bathroom fixtures mirror spacious fullsize beds comfortable slightly wider sitting window closet safe minibar tv flat panel maybe 40 inches spanish catalan british american channels english subtitles tv window look sideways bed otherwise facing bare white wall free wireless internet available strongly password printed card tv free internet nearly europe service cleaning perfectly normal efficient hotel businessfriendly exceptionally clean sort generic establishment

Reviews.Title: “Really what we were looking for”

Reviews.Content: liked hotel cozy location central messy near plaza catalunya ramblas middle confusion quiet safe staff friendly nice promptly map signed found breakfast expensive prefered taking caffe di roma street

Reviews.Title: “Business Hotel with a great location”
Reviews.Author: BDBSouthAfrica
Reviews.Content: surprises previous reviews indicated hotel standard business hotel hotel lacked character warm funky fun functional front desk staff efficient pleasant hotel represented value stay hotel located outside touristy upmarket shopping barcelona easy access eating short ten minute walk comfortable clean

Reviews.Content: positive location ok nice staff front desk breakfast ok negative hotel definitely 4stars hotel desk occupied tv impossible internet hotel announced free wireless hotel 2 pcs lobby guests 11pm business travellers

Reviews.Title: “Not even close to a 4 star hotel..maybe 2 or 3.”
Reviews.Author: modernartobsession
Reviews.Content: dont believe 4 start rating correct maybe 2 correct hotel tired badly major lift asap beds lobby rugs drapes furniture bedding noisy constant car noise nigh minimal staff nice baggage clerks concierge dinning cheap buffet breakfast service dont 4 stars 20 ago

Reviews.Title: “good value for the price”
Reviews.Author: travellingkate024
Reviews.Content: partner stayed balmoral hotel 7 nights trip spain paid 77 87 euros night deal opinion fancy clean annoyance internet constantly business centre closed 10pm hotel staff friendliest hotel location diagonal close passeig de gracia nice little las ramblas tourist zoo virtually 24 hours day return barcelona try stay little closer water loved barceloneta night price hotel fine choice

Reviews.Author: TravellerDT
Reviews.Content: visited week hotel location safe busy touristy la rambla 5 min walk diagonal station 5 min walk bus stops passeig de gracia main street walk view 2 gaudi monuments shop takes half hour walk reach catalunya la ramblas nice scenic walk clean toilets clean amenities hotel hotel reception staff friendly ok hotel nice staff quick respond extra pillows luggage assistance calling cabs hotel short stay barcelona safe shops plus nice 20 min walk sagrada
